title: NCERT Constitutes Team To Develop Class 11, 12 Textbooks On Artificial Intelligence
description: The Ministry of Education has repeatedly reaffirmed its commitment to advancing Artificial Intelligence and Computational Thinking (AI & CT) as essential components of future-ready education.
content:
New Delhi: The National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) has constituted a textbook development team to develop syllabi and books of Artificial Intelligence for Grades 11 and 12, the Ministry of Education said.

title: NCERT constitutes team to develop Class 11, 12 textbooks on AI
description: India is gearing up to incorporate artificial intelligence throughout its curriculum. The NCERT is actively crafting new AI textbooks aimed at empowering Grade 11 and 12 students. Additionally, from Grade 6 onwards, students will gain exposure to AI concepts in vocational education.

title: S&P500, NASDAQ, Dow Jones futures climb ahead of holiday-shortened week; Oracle, Nvidia rebounds
description: US stock futures are showing a positive start for the week. Traders are watching for a potential Santa Claus rally.
